name: 7.14 "I Kid You Not" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: In Sam's 10 Commandments, what was commandment 4?
questions.explanation:
"Honor the hair."

	Number 3 was "Thou shalt not loan the car." The other two were not mentioned but knowing Sam I could see them being part of his Ten Commandments. Number 16 was in reference to his Red Sox jersey number.

questions.text: What myth did the guys say about Sam's car?
questions.correct: All the women that have ridden in Sam's car end up sleeping with him.
options: All the women that rode in Sam's car have had a really nice trip.
Sam's car was once featured in a movie.
questions.explanation:
All the women that have ridden in Sam's car end up sleeping with him.

	Rebecca said she rode in Sam's car but didn't sleep with Sam. The gang start to tease her about this saying that she did indeed have sex with Sam.

questions.text: Which of Carla's kids did Carla trick into playing baseball?
questions.explanation:
Ludlow.

	Ludlow was played by Jarrett Lennon. He started acting at age 4.

questions.text: Why did the other kids make fun of Carla's child?
questions.correct: He didn't know which way to run after he hit the ball.
options: He didn't know how to hold the bat.
He got hit by the ball.
questions.explanation:
He didn't know which way to run after he hit the ball.

	Lud was a bit of a geek. He was into things like opera and art, which Carla knew nothing about. Lud's father was Frasier's mentor Dr. Bennett Ludlow who was seen in a previous episode years before.

questions.text: Where did Frasier and Lilith take Carla's child?
questions.explanation:
the opera.

	Lud explained the opera and Sam replied, "Kind of like 'Star Search'." Lud rolled his eyes and said, "Basically.". This was Carla's smartest child and most cultured. Carla worried about this because she was not very cultured.

questions.text: What happened every time Woody asked Sam to borrow the Corvette?
questions.explanation:
Sam laughed.

	Woody said he was starting to love Sam's laugh. Woody was very persistent however and finally got to use Sam's Corvette but Sam followed close behind.

questions.text: What word did Carla keep using at the restaurant?
questions.explanation:
delightful.

	Carla wanted to show Frasier, Lilith and her son that she could fit in at an elegant restaurant. She even went to the point of not scolding Lud when he misbehaved because Frasier said that was what the child wanted was attention.

questions.text: What did Carla ask the waiter at the restaurant?
questions.explanation:
Do you have frog legs?.

	The waiter said they did and Carla replied, "Wear nice pants and no one will notice." Lud told Carla that she was funny.

options: He was going to cry like a baby.
questions.explanation:
He didn't want children.

	Frasier decided that after Lud set his feet on fire that he was not good with children. He decided therefore he did not want to have children.

options: She thought what Lud did was amusing.
questions.explanation:
She was pregnant.

	Frasier despite having said he didn't want children was excited by the news. Lilith was glad that he was happy about the baby.
